text: Osman Cavcı (born December 27, 1962) is a Turkish actor, director and screenwriter, who is known for his leading role in cult film Zampara Seyfettin (1995). Osman Cavcı was born in Istanbul. His father is theater actor İsmail Cavcı. In 1972, Osman Cavcı started his acting career as a child actor at a theatre group in Izmir. After that he met with movie director Ertem Eğilmez and player his first movie role in Hababam Sınıfı Güle Güle (1981). ==Other websites== * * Osman Cavcı at SinemaTurk Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Istanbul Category:Turkish movie actors Category:Turkish movie directors Category:Turkish screenwriters
title: Osman Cavcı
